Strong interest designing & delivering large-scale distributed systems handling millions of real-time requests per second.

Title: Manager, Corporate Engineering
RoleDescription:
Every day, tens of millions of people come to Roblox to explore, create, play, learn, and connect with friends in 3D immersive digital experiences all created by our global community of developers and creators. 
At Roblox, were building the tools and platform that empower our community to bring any experience that they can imagine to life. Our vision is to reimagine the way people come together, from anywhere in the world, and on any device. Were on a mission to connect a billion people with optimism and civility, and looking for amazing talent to help us get there. 
A career at Roblox means youll be working to shape the future of human interaction, solving unique technical challenges at scale, and helping to create safer, more civil shared experiences for everyone.About Corporate Engineering
Within Roblox, Corporate Engineering exists to enhance our workforces effectiveness, efficiency, and experience through the use of technology. When we are great at our job, our workforce is profoundly more efficient and effective, and their experience of technology at Roblox is one of joy and satisfaction. And within Corporate Engineering, the team most directly impacting that experience is Client Services  responsible for our internal support group, IT Asset Management, and Client Platform Engineering (responsible for endpoint device management).  
About Client Services
Client Services is the most tactical, reactive, part of Corporate Engineering. Its also the most distributed, with support groups located in each of several buildings occupied by Roblox, as well as a new support group in India. Its also comprised of everything from hourly employees  some of whom are in their first professional role  to tenured, highly experienced, engineers. And as an operational group, it is quite good (were proud of our 98%+ CSAT and our 2.5% reopened ticket rates). It also suffers from some of the classic ills of such teams  were great at responsiveness, but still have room to more thoughtfully grow the members of the team, focus on sustainability, and be more proactive, deliberate, and visionary about how this team improves the effectiveness, efficiency, and experience of the workforce, as well as acting as more of a partner in our engagement with our workforce and our partners and less as a service provider.
Join us as a Manager of Corporate Engineering (Client Services Manager), reporting to the Director of Corporate Engineering. In this role, you will be instrumental in shaping the culture of Client Services and Corporate Engineering, fostering a proactive and strategic approach to long-term investments while effectively balancing them with the immediate operational needs of our workforce. 
You Will:

Help define the KPIs that give us insight into the work were doing and its impact, define what good enough looks like for these KPIs, and work toward these standards; 
Define a consistent expectations model for the people in your team and then help grow your team to meet these expectations  and then grow your people to their next role, inside or outside the team; 
Work with your staff to identify where we invest in technology and what these investments look like, focusing on workforce efficiency, experience, and effectiveness (e.g. what is the role of AI chatbots in the support experience? How do we make sure they are a value-add to the people who depend on us to help them?)
Work closely with cross-functional partners (e.g. PeopleOps, Legal, Security, Trust and Safety) to identify opportunities to increase our impact

You Have: 

A diverse people leadership experience, having at one point or another led teams with

A reactive/tactical focus
A strategic, planning-based, engineering focus
Employees with diverse levels of experience from interns to tenured engineers
Hourly and exempt employees 



A thoughtful perspective on balancing principled decision-making and pragmatism
Outstanding organizational, collaboration, leadership, and communication skills.

You Are: 

Passionate about people leadership and growing people; 
Comfortable and experienced with all aspects of performance management; 
Humble, introspective, and eager to get better; 
Deeply mindful of the impact your team has on the daily experience of thousands of Roblox employees, and hungry to improve it
Curious about new technology and its potential (along with limitations and pitfalls) to positively disrupt the work we do
Hungry to wrestle with the challenge of balancing short-term impact with long-term investments
